arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of IPAM Resource Discovery Association.

ipamArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IPAM.

ipamId.description: The ID of the IPAM to associate.

ipamRegion.description: The home region of the IPAM.

ipamResourceDiscoveryId.description: The ID of the Resource Discovery to associate.

isDefault.description: A boolean to identify if the Resource Discovery is the accounts default resource discovery.

ownerId.description: The account ID for the account that manages the Resource Discovery

state.description: The lifecycle state of the association when you associate or disassociate a resource discovery.

tags.description: A map of tags to add to the IPAM resource discovery association resource.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.

ipamResourceDiscoveryId.description: The ID of the Resource Discovery to associate.

tags.description: A map of tags to add to the IPAM resource discovery association resource.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering VpcIpamResourceDiscoveryAssociation resources.
